name: @sylphx/zen
description: Zen state management library - extreme minimalism, extreme speed.

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --minify --sourcemap && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --minify --sourcemap --format cjs --outfile dist/index.cjs && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist

size-limit.name: zen (full)
size-limit.import: { atom, computed, map, deepMap, task, batch, onMount, subscribe, get }

author: Sylph Lab <hi@sylphlab.com>
